BIO

I am an aspiring web developer, currently working towards transitioning from call centre and warehouse based work into a front end web development role.

My recent projects have been centered around learning SASS, Vanilla CSS, HTML & JavaScript, although as I expand my skillset the projects will be updated to reflect this.

AWX / Hilton Foods

SAP Operator

My role as a SAP Operator at Hilton Foods is centered around staging ingredients through SAP as they are issued out to the production lines.

Other duties include stocktake, stock replenishment and warehouse management.

Media Sales Consultant

Key responsibilities at Newscorp included inbound & outbound call taking, sales and account management.

My time in this role helped me develop on rapport building & problem solving with both regular and infrequent clients.

Sales & Service Specialist
